WRITING.TITLE: My dads joke from maaany years ago =) I still love it!
WRITING.TEXT: A family of tomatoes are walking down the street. There's a papa tomato, mama tomato and baby tomato. Baby tomato ends up falling behind so much that papa tomato gets pissed. He rushes back stomps on him and says...KETCHUP!

WRITING.TITLE: Dump in the woods
WRITING.TEXT:
A bear and a rabbit are taking a dump side by side in the woods.
The bear leans over and says to the rabbit, "Hey rabbit, do you ever have trouble with shit sticking to your fur?"
The rabbit says, "No."
The bears picks up the rabbit and wipes his ass
whyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyy
could you just imagine being this kids parents and seeing this all over the internet.... lol damn !!!
I was at the track this weekend and this guy was riding one back and forth in the pit area... that's basically all I saw him do
my point was... i saw them on the internet... and then i saw them in real life!!! I was amazed !
I found them at Walmart....

OKAY Sorry for keeping everyone waiting!!!
Just to bring everyone up to date, Gramma fell and hurt her hip a few weeks ago so she is just recovering from it right now.. She is doing great but we figured it would be okay to wait a little bit so she could be a little stronger for the big surprise!
Gramma Rose will be getting her cards this weekend so just a few more days .. more cards are still coming in the mail which is incredible! You have all been such an amazing help this wouldn't be possible without you, here's a new news clip that was on this weekend... http://www.cbc.ca/news/canada/toronto/gramma-rose-cheered-worldwide-at-107-1.3002321
AND THE NEWEST TOTAL CARD COUNT ..... 399 Cards!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
oops!

OKAY TOTAL CARDS 310!!! THIS IS AMAZING!!!! I think we are telling her this weekend there is so many cards she is going to be very busy this month!! =)

Thank you so much to everyone who has sent a card!!!!! you are AMAZING!!!!

Beautiful !!!!!!

So Torontonians Saturday Feb 28th between 12-1 channel CBC I will be on TV talking about the cards for my great grandmother. there is also a clip of her and my family eating at a restaurant together so you can see her. =)
Thank you so much for helping out and being a part in this. so far we have 272 cards!!! xoxox

Rose Lefko-Cohen 8000 Bathurst st unit 1 P.O. box 30044 New Westminster PO Vaughan Ontario L4J 0B8

This is continuing from the birthday card story!
I will be on CTV Weekend News tomorrow morning at 9:20 am hopefully not fainting lol I am very nervous.. but YAY I CAN'T WAIT!!!!!
